items.content_html: one of my favorite parts about this current AI hype cycle is how everyone is mad that AI will replace engineers, but those same people had no issue with replacing factory workers, truck drivers, etc.

items.title: I spent a bit of time in SF recently and saw some wonderful friends
items.content_html:
Randeep!

Jeff!

Sam!

Tom!

Me!
items.content_text: ## Randeep! ## Jeff! ## Sam! ## Tom! ## Me!

items.content_html: Was wonderful to hang with Ben Huh today in rainy San Francisco
items.content_text: Was wonderful to hang with Ben Huh today in rainy San Francisco

items.content_html: Bye Palo Alto. More time next time.
items.content_text: Bye Palo Alto. More time next time.

items.content_html:
Airports are so weird.

  • TSA dude busting me for having chapstick in my pocket
  • everyone is a noob
  • nobody knows how anything works
  • people in lounges having serious confidential conversations out loud.
  • planes
items.content_text:
Airports are so weird. 

- TSA dude busting me for having chapstick in my pocket
- everyone is a noob
- nobody knows how anything works
- people in lounges having serious confidential conversations out loud. 
- planes
